titles.title: Childcare Expansion for Military Families Act of 2020
Childcare Expansion for Military Families Act of 2020
A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to establish a program to carry out minor military construction projects to construct child development centers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Childcare Expansion for Military Families Act of 2020
This bill directs the Department of Defense to establish a program to carry out minor military construction projects to construct child development centers.
